page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN STRATFORD
page.content: We carried out a survey of a hundred and twenty houses.We asked each household what their{occupation}was and the two most common were {housewives}and{retired.}There were sixty seven different occupations altogether. The other occupations in order were:-- Secretaries,Storekeepers, Managers, Electricians,Unemployed,Salesmen, Engineers,Students,Nursing Sisters, Teaching,Factory Workers, Insurance, Clerks,Drivers and chefs. Most people worked in{service jobs}but not many people worked in{industry. The most{unusual}occupations were Metal Polisher,Anadizer,Coremaker, Radiographer,Software Analyst and Feedmobile Operator. The{unemployment rate}was 3% compared with 14% for the whole country.
